metadata.title: CVE-2021-47144 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/amdgpu: fix refcount leak [Why] the gem object rfb->base.obj[0] isget according to num_planes in amdgpufb_create, but is not put according tonum_planes [How] put rfb->base.obj[0] in amdgpu_fbdev_destroy according tonum_planes

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
